text: live music history and seafood on an
island I'm in I'm Nikki and this is
Jason we sold everything bought an RV
and hit the road let the adventure begin
dolphin Island is a fourteen mile
stretch of sand it has history and
stories that go back three centuries the
island attracts history buffs and bird
watchers from all over today we're here
for the music we're staying at the
campground it's just a short walk for
the festival yes there's even a
campground on this tiny island it's the
first sea grass music festival and we
hear there's going to be some big town
it's an awesome spot for a music
festival
forth games is a surreal backdrop for
the music and the locals can fill you in
on some of its history
in between bands is the perfect time to
drink and yourself silly the food is all
local dives so it's almost as much a
food festival as it is music
as the day turns tonight the people
slowly fill the space waiting for big
names such as Sara Watkins and Ricky
Skaggs who knew a small island could
grow such a big event
